S1E1.title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
S1E1.des:
Ross and Emily get married, but she cannot
                forgive him for calling her Rachel during the vows. Chandler and Monica search for a place to have
                sex.

S1E2.title: The One with All the Kissing
S1E2.des:
Chandler kisses both Rachel and Phoebe in order
                to cover up a kiss he gave to Monica. Rachel finally tells Ross her feelings.

S1E3.title: The One Hundredth
S1E3.des:
Phoebe goes into labor and is stuck with a
                doctor who is obsessed with the show "Happy Days." Monica plans a date with a male nurse to spite
                Chandler.

S1E4.title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
S1E4.des:
The gang discovers that Phoebe hates PBS. Emily
                tells Ross she'll give him a second chance only if he cuts all ties with Rachel.

S1E5.title: The One with the Kips
S1E5.des:
Chandler and Monica plan a trip to Atlantic City
                for some private time. When Joey discovers that they are dating, they swear him to secrecy.

S1E6.title: The One with the Yeti
S1E6.des:
Monica and Rachel are afraid of a hairy new
                neighbor -- until they find out how handsome he is with his hair cut.

S1E7.title: The One Where Ross Moves In
S1E7.des:
After getting kicked out of his apartment, Ross
                moves in temporarily with Chandler and Joey, driving all three of them crazy.

S1E8.title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
S1E8.des:
It's Thanksgiving, and the gang remembers former
                terrible Thanksgiving experiences. Chandler tells Monica that he loves her.

S1E9.title: The One with Ross's Sandwich
S1E9.des:
Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes
                his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's
                dating.

S1E10.title: The One with the Inappropriate Sister
S1E10.des:
Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army
                during the holidays. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

S1E11.title: The One with All the Resolutions
S1E11.des:
The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but
                it looks like Rachel's resolution -- to stop gossiping -- is going to be the hardest to keep.

S1E12.title: The One with Chandler's Work Laugh
S1E12.des:
Ross dates Janice after discovering that Emily
                is getting remarried. Monica hates the fake laugh that Chandler uses in response to his boss's
                jokes.

S1E13.title: The One with Joey's Bag
S1E13.des:
Phoebe meets her father at her grandmother's
                funeral. Chandler discovers that Monica gives bad massages. Rachel dresses Joey for an audition.

S1E14.title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
S1E14.des:
Ross rents an apartment with a window facing
                Monica and Rachel's place. Phoebe sees Monica and Chandler having sex and learns the truth.

S1E15.title: The One with the Girl Who Hits Joey
S1E15.des:
Joey's girlfriend likes to punch him. Ross
                alienates his new neighbors when he refuses to contribute to the retirement donation for the
                janitor.

S1E16.title: The One with the Cop
S1E16.des:
After Phoebe finds a police badge, she uses it
                to do good deeds. Joey worries that he is in love with Monica.

S1E17.title: The One with Rachel's Inadvertent Kiss
S1E17.des:
Rachel accidentally kisses the man interviewing
                her for a job. Joey becomes obsessed with a woman living in Ross' apartment complex.

S1E18.title: The One Where Rachel Smokes
S1E18.des:
Rachel starts smoking when she realizes that her
                boss and co-workers at her new job are smokers. Joey and Ben audition for a commercial.

S1E19.title: The One Where Ross Can't Flirt
S1E19.des:
Ross tries to flirt with the pizza delivery
                girl, with horrible results. Rachel loses a pair of earrings that Monica had lent to Phoebe.

S1E20.title: The One with the Ride-Along
S1E20.des:
While the men are out, Emily leaves a message
                for Ross. Rachel, who was in Ross's apartment at the time, hears the message and accidentally erases
                it.

S1E21.title: The One with the Ball
S1E21.des:
Gary asks Phoebe to move in with him. Monica and
                Chandler join Ross and Joey in a game of catch that lasts for hours.

S1E22.title: The One with Joey's Big Break
S1E22.des:
Joey and Chandler take a road trip to Las Vegas,
                where Joey has landed the lead role in a movie. But the two argue and Joey goes on alone.

S1E23.title: The One in Vegas: Part 1
S1E23.des:
The gang decides to go out to Las Vegas to
                surprise Joey and to celebrate Monica's and Chandler's one-year anniversary.

S1E24.title: The One in Vegas: Part 2
S1E24.des:
Monica and Chandler reconcile and, on the roll
                of the dice, decide to go to a chapel and get married immediately.

year:
The friends continue to haphazardly navigate their way
            through Manhattan, landing in more improbable situations than anyone has a right to imagine.
about:
The friends continue to haphazardly navigate their way
            through Manhattan, landing in more improbable situations than anyone has a right to imagine.
